abstract: A nonprofit group that lobbies for the removal of carriage horses unveiled a faux-vintage electric car as a suggested replacement.
snippet: A nonprofit group that lobbies for the removal of carriage horses unveiled a faux-vintage electric car as a suggested replacement.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals

lead_paragraph: The faux-vintage electric car that horse advocates want to replace Central Park's carriage horses has classic white-walled tires, running boards, mahogany and an "ah-hoogah" horn.

headline.main: Meet the Contraption That Wants to Replace Central Park Horses
